notifications.title: This is an admin notification smoke test
Our records indicate the Social Security Number in your Personal Information is invalid or missing. Please provide your Social Security Number or select to not provide your Social Security Number.
You need to modify your NetID account to activate essential UW Services.
UW Employee Annual Benefits Enrollment starts October 5 and ends October 30, 2015.
notifications.actionAlt: View news article about Annual Benefits Enrollment.
